thread.title: Kelly Clarkson Announces She's Having a Boy
thread.title_full: Kelly Clarkson Announces She's Having a Boy

title: Kelly Clarkson Announces She's Having a Boy
text:
Kelly Clarkson Announces She's Having a Boy Posted today at 12:00pm 
ABC/Ida Mae Astute (NASHVILLE) -- Kelly Clarkson is having a boy. 
The singer revealed on Instagram Friday that she’s expecting a son with husband Brandon Blackstock. 
She posted an adorable picture of her one-year-old daughter, River Rose, along with the caption: "In other news, River's gonna have a little baby brother :) #itsaboy We’re so excited!" 

A photo posted by Kelly Clarkson (@kellyclarkson) on Oct 23, 2015 at 8:59am PDT 
Kelly announced her second pregnancy back in August, during a concert at the Staples Center in Los Angeles.
